# GitHub Copilot Instructions

When generating code for this project, strictly follow the rules below.

## Keep all text plain

Keep all text plain and professional without any emoji characters or symbols.

## Formatting

- Use Markdown bullet points or numbered lists for structured data.
- Enforce semantic structure using standard Markdown heading syntax (`#`-`######`).
- Reserve bold text (`**`) strictly for inline emphasis.

## Conclusion

Do not suggest code that does not comply with the above rules.
